short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Policy Violations Helper analyzes your videos for potential violations, offering insights and recommendations to stay compliant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension analyzes your videos for potential violations of YouTube's Community Guidelines and Policies, offering clear insights and actionable recommendations to fix issues before they become a problem. Stay compliant and protect your content with YouTube Policy Violations Helper, the ultimate tool for YouTube creators who want to avoid demonetization, strikes, or even account termination.

Our AI-powered tool is trained on YouTube’s published guidelines and policies but is not affiliated with Google or YouTube. We aim to support creators by helping them understand the platform's rules, ensuring content remains safe, compliant, and suitable for all audiences.

By using the YouTube Policy Violations Helper, you can:
- Identify content that might violate YouTube’s policies.
- Receive tailored suggestions to make your videos compliant.
- Avoid demonetization, strikes, or account risks.

We’re here to help creators thrive while promoting a safer, more responsible content ecosystem.
Use YouTube Policy Violations Helper today and make compliance a seamless part of your creative process!

Privacy and Data Use
YouTube Policy Violations Helper respects your privacy and adheres strictly to Google's User Data Privacy Policy.

Data Collection: Our extension does not collect, store, or share personal or sensitive user data. When you use our extension, video data is securely transmitted to our cloud servers for analysis. We only collect the minimum necessary data to provide accurate policy compliance insights.

Data Usage: The data analyzed is used exclusively to identify potential YouTube Community Guidelines violations and provide actionable recommendations.

Data Storage: We do not store your video data permanently. All data is processed temporarily and deleted after analysis.

No Third-Party Sharing: We do not share your data with any third parties.
Your trust and privacy are our priorities. For more details, please review our full Privacy Policy (link to https://eudaimoniatech.io/privacy-policy) or contact us directly.

Disclaimer: This extension is an independent tool and is not endorsed, sponsored, or partnered with Google or YouTube.
